echo-category-title-requestssl-request-c: Comment added to a custom domain request
echo-category-title-requestssl-request-s: Status updated for a custom domain request
echo-pref-tooltip-requestssl-new-request: Notify me when there are any new custom domain requests.
echo-pref-tooltip-requestssl-request-com: Notify me when there is a comment on an custom domain request that I have participated on.
echo-pref-tooltip-requestssl-request-sta: Notify me when the status is updated for a custom domain request that I have participated on.
requestssl-cloudflare-comment-active: This custom domain has been successfully activated and is now applied to this wiki.
requestssl-cloudflare-comment-permission: Since the requester is not a bureaucrat, a system administrator will manually review this request.
requestssl-cloudflare-comment-error: An error occurred while processing your custom domain request with Cloudflare. A system administrator will now manually review your request.
requestssl-cloudflare-comment-error-othe: An error occurred while processing your request with Cloudflare. Cloudflare reported the following error: $1
requestssl-cloudflare-comment-error-veri: An error occurred while verifying your custom domain is pointed correctly to Cloudflare. Cloudflare reported the following error: $1
requestssl-cloudflare-label-success: This request has been queued for automatic Cloudflare processing. Please check back in a few minutes.
requestssl-comment-success: Comment successfully added to this request.
requestssl-customdomain-disallowed: The requested custom domain is not allowed. Please make sure to use a valid custom domain. If you think this is an error, please contact us.
requestssl-customdomain-no-hostname: You have not inputted a hostname.
requestssl-customdomain-not-a-url: You have not inputted a valid URL.
requestssl-customdomain-protocol-not-htt: Invalid protocol. Please make sure to set the protocol to https://.
requestssl-customdomain-unneeded-compone: There are unneeded components in the URL. Please only set the domain with the https:// protocol.
requestssl-desc: An extension designed to automate user custom domain requests.
requestssl-duplicate-request: Unable to submit this request. It is too similar to an already open request.
requestsslqueue-header-info: You can use this form to search through custom domain requests. Use the parameters below to refine your search.
requestssl-help-reason: Please add any additional comments that you think may be relevant to this request.
requestssl-help-customdomain: Enter the full URL for the desired custom domain (i.e. https://example.org).
requestssl-help-target: This must be a valid database name (i.e. examplewiki).
requestssl-help-target-subdomain: This must be a valid subdomain (i.e. examplewiki.wikifarm.com)
requestssl-info-request-private: This request is marked as private. It is not publicly viewable.
requestssl-info-requester-blocked: The requester ($1) has been locally blocked on this wiki ($2).
requestssl-info-requester-locked: The requester ($1) has been locked. This request should be declined.
requestssl-invalid-target: The provided target is not a valid database name.
requestssl-label-lock: Lock this request from being edited or from comments being added to it?
requestssl-label-status-updated-comment: Optional additional comment to add to this request:
requestssl-label-update-status: Set the status of this request to:
requestssl-log-header: This is a log of all custom domain requests and status updates.
requestssl-notcentral-text: Custom domains requests are unavailable on this wiki. Please request a custom domain configuration on the central wiki.
requestssl-notification-body-new-request:
A new custom domain request was received.
Reason given: $1
Requester: $2
Target Database Name: $3
Custom domain URL: $4
requestssl-notification-header-comment: Custom domain request #$1 received a comment.
requestssl-notification-header-status-up: Status updated for custom domain request #$1
requestssl-notloggedin: Sorry, you need to [$1 log in] before you can request a custom domain configuration.
requestssl-private: You do not have permission to view this request as it is marked as private.
requestssl-request-locked: This request has been locked. It cannot be edited, and no comments can be added to it.
requestssl-status-updated-success: Status successfully updated for this request.
requestssl-success: Your custom domain request ($1) was successfully submitted. Your request will be reviewed as soon as possible.
requestssl-success-locked: This request has been successfully locked. It can no longer be edited and comments cannot be added to it.
requestssl-success-private: This request has been successfully marked as private. It is no longer publicly viewable.
requestssl-success-public: This request has been successfully marked as public. It is now publicly viewable.
requestssl-success-unlocked: This request has been successfully unlocked.
requestsslprivate-log-header: This is a log of all custom domain requests and status updates for requests with targets that are private wikis.
logentry-requestssl-statusupdate: $1 {{GENDER:$2|updated}} status of custom domain request $4 to '$5'.
logentry-requestsslprivate-request: $1 {{GENDER:$2|requested}} a custom domain for private wiki $4 in $5.
logentry-requestsslprivate-statusupdate: $1 {{GENDER:$2|updated}} status of private custom domain request $4 to '$5'.
requestcustomdomain: Request to use a custom domain for your wiki
